title: Fuyu no Sonata Episode 0
opening_song: "From the Beginning to End" by Ryu
ending_song: "Tada Kimi Dake o" by Lee Se-jun
sinopse:
Based on the Korean drama television series about the love between two childhood friends and the tragic events that happen.

In terms of the timeline of the Winter Sonata series, it belongs in the time gap midway through episode 21.

(Source: Frostii Subs)
